item.description:
This meetup is sold out.  We will have others events posted soon!

 

The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH the weekend of January 6th-8th for what is one of the sickest weekends of the year! The lodge is filling up fast so if you haven't made it up yet and have been thinking about it this might be the time to come up. For this particular weekend we are only accepting RSVPs for people who can stay 2 nights.

We are located only 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, Black, and Bretton Woods right in the heart of North Conway and about 40 minutes from Sunday River.

Discount lift tickets to a nearby mountain will be available to those who stay at our lodge.  Mountain TBA.

Lodging is $20/night and we are offering a dinner (optional) on Saturday night consisting of a meat or veggie option. The charge for dinner will be $16.

Full directions and information will be provided to those who RSVP.

All guests must be 21+

Sign up soon, the bunks won't last!
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts,January 6-8th, 2012: The cure for what ails you SOLD OUT!!
